author: rdonkin
msg: Fixed typo and improved phrasing. For some reason the html version has different line endings :-/ Thanks to Rahul Akolkar for feedback.

author: nagy
msg: Fix for a race condition caused by a handler pausing a message and another thread resuming it before the call stack has unwound.  All handlers must now return an InvocationProcessingInstruction to indicate how processing should continue.
